content.html:
Meet your
new phone

xfinitymobile

SAMSUNG
Galaxy S9|S9+

A map of the hardware

Access the edge

With edge screen technology, access people,
information, and apps in a flash.


To turn on the edge screen feature, start at the
Home screen and swipe up for Apps. Then tap


Settings > Display > Edge screen.

Apps edge


Create shortcuts to access frequently
used apps.

People edge


See missed calls and message notifications
from your important contacts.

Smart select


Capture images and GIF animations.

Say hello to Bixby!

Hello Bixby lets you set reminders and create
voice dictations. Plus, quickly search for content
on your phone and across the Internet.


To launch Hello Bixby, simply press the
Bixby button.

NOTE: For more information about Bixby, visit
samsung.com/us/support/owners/app/Baby

Steps to phone setup


Charge up


To charge your phone, first connect the
Adaptive Fast Charger to the USB cable, and
connect the USB to your phone. Then plug the
Adaptive Fast Charger into an outlet. Keep your
phone plugged in until it reaches 100% battery.

WARNING: Use only Samsung-approved charging devices.
Samsung accessories are designed to maximize battery life.
Using other accessories may invalidate your warranty and may
cause damage.

Activate!


Before you turn on your phone, activate
your service. On another device, go to
xfinitymobile.com/activate. Log in and
you'll be walked through the process.

microSD/SIM card tray
If you have a microSD card, insert it here:

NOTE: To access the microSD card slot, remove the
microSD/SIM card tray from the device.

The how-to basics

Powering on and off


To turn your phone on, press and hold the
Power/Lock button. Once it's on, press and
hold that same button to power it off.

The screen basics


To turn on your screen, press the Power/Lock
button, then swipe up onscreen to unlock it.
To turn your screen off, just press the
Power/Lock button.

Using the Xfinity Mobile app


The Xfinity Mobile app is preloaded on
your phone. Consider it your control center
to track your usage, manage your account,
and ask us anything.

Voicemail 101

Need help? We're here.
Dial our support line: 1 (888) 936-4968

Copyright 2018 Samsung Electronics Company, Ltd. Samsung,
Galaxy S9, Galaxy S9+ and Samsung Pay, are trademarks of
Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. Google, Android, Google Play
and other marks are trademarks of Google LLC. Screen images
simulated. Appearance of device may vary.
The Xfinity Mobile logo and the New Network mark ("O")
are trademarks of Comcast. All rights reserved.

Printed in Korea.


GH68-48871A

SAMSUNG
Galaxy S9 Galaxy S9+

# Access the edge

# With edge screen technology, access people,
information, and apps in a flash.

To turn on the edge screen feature, start at the
Home screen and swipe up for Apps. Then tap

# Settings > Display > Edge screen.

![image](/image/placeholder)
all 100% ■ 12:45 PM

edge screen.

# Apps edge

Create shortcuts to access frequently
used apps.

# People edge

See missed calls and message notifications
from your important contacts.

# Smart select

Capture images and GIF animations.

# Say hello to Bixby!

Hello Bixby lets you set reminders and create
voice dictations. Plus, quickly search for content
on your phone and across the Internet.

# To launch Hello Bixby, simply press the
Bixby button.

![image](/image/placeholder)
Bixby

NOTE: For more information about Bixby, visit
samsung.com/us/support/owners/app/Baby

# Steps to phone setup

# Charge up

To charge your phone, first connect the
Adaptive Fast Charger to the USB cable, and
connect the USB to your phone. Then plug the
Adaptive Fast Charger into an outlet. Keep your
phone plugged in until it reaches 100% battery.

![image](/image/placeholder)


WARNING: Use only Samsung-approved charging devices.
Samsung accessories are designed to maximize battery life.
Using other accessories may invalidate your warranty and may
cause damage.

# Activate!

Before you turn on your phone, activate
your service. On another device, go to
xfinitymobile.com/activate. Log in and
you'll be walked through the process.

microSD/SIM card tray
If you have a microSD card, insert it here:

![image](/image/placeholder)
WISD
xfinity
wroson

NOTE: To access the microSD card slot, remove the
microSD/SIM card tray from the device.

# The how-to basics

# Powering on and off

To turn your phone on, press and hold the
Power/Lock button. Once it's on, press and
hold that same button to power it off.

![image](/image/placeholder)


# The screen basics

To turn on your screen, press the Power/Lock
button, then swipe up onscreen to unlock it.
To turn your screen off, just press the
Power/Lock button.

![image](/image/placeholder)
↑

# Using the Xfinity Mobile app

The Xfinity Mobile app is preloaded on
your phone. Consider it your control center
to track your usage, manage your account,
and ask us anything.

![image](/image/placeholder)
xfInIty
○

# Voicemail 101

Listen to your messages or read them
as text. You can also record a custom
voicemail greeting.

![image](/image/placeholder)
QO

Need help? We're here.
Dial our support line: 1 (888) 936-4968

Copyright 2018 Samsung Electronics Company, Ltd. Samsung,
Galaxy S9, Galaxy S9+ and Samsung Pay, are trademarks of
Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. Google, Android, Google Play
and other marks are trademarks of Google LLC. Screen images
simulated. Appearance of device may vary.
The Xfinity Mobile logo and the New Network mark ("O")
are trademarks of Comcast. All rights reserved.

- Printed in Korea.

Power/Lock button. Once it's on, press and
hold that same button to power it off.
